windDirectionRelativeToWave.name: windDirectionRelativeToWave
windDirectionRelativeToWave.description: Wind direction relative to wave direction in degrees.
windDirectionRelativeToWave.label: Wind Dir. Rel. to Wave [deg]

currentDirectionRelativeToWind.name: currentDirectionRelativeToWind
currentDirectionRelativeToWind.description: Current direction relative to wind direction in degrees.
currentDirectionRelativeToWind.label: Current Dir. Rel. to Wind [deg]

screeningTol.name: screeningTol
screeningTol.description: Screening tolerance. 0.0: means only the higest tension is considered, 0.1: means all cases with maximum tension 10 percent below the absolute max are to be considered.
screeningTol.label: Screening Tolerance

simulationLength.name: simulationLength
simulationLength.description: simulation length in seconds for screening analysis.
simulationLength.label: Simulation Length [s]

numberOfSeeds.name: numberOfSeeds
numberOfSeeds.description: Number of seeds for sample variability study of stochastic waves.
numberOfSeeds.label: Number of Seeds

simulationLength.name: simulationLength
simulationLength.description: simulation length in seconds for limit state analysis.
simulationLength.label: Simulation Length [s]
